page.title: 11Religious Life
page.content: There are three main congregations of Christian Worshippers in Hellifield,the Church of England at St.Aidans Church, the Methodists and the Roman Catholics who worship in Settle. In addition there are other small groups of Christians who prefer to worship God in their way. The people of all ages who attend worship in their churches in Hellifield give thanks to God each week for His goodness shown to them in the wonders of the world and in their own lives. They pray also for the special needs of the young, the old, the sick and the suffering. The Christian religion teaches us to love God. Christians also love their neighbours as though they are ourselves. So Christians are members of nearly all the village societies, clubs and organisations.
